About Ritual

Ritual is building a sovereign, execution layer for AI, with our private testnet already live and running. The Ritual chain is the first blockchain custom-built to support AI-native operations, designed from the ground up to enable a new class of applications at the intersection of crypto and AI. Our first product, Infernet, is pioneering new ground as the first solution to enable developers to access AI models both on-chain via smart contracts and off-chain, demonstrating our commitment to bridging these transformative technologies.

About The Role

As a Frontend Engineer at Ritual, you'll build sophisticated interfaces that enable developers to interact with our AI and blockchain infrastructure, as well as rapidly build prototypes built on top of Ritual Chain. You'll create intuitive dashboards and monitoring tools that make complex distributed systems accessible and manageable, from tracking cross-chain transactions to monitoring AI compute nodes, and much more.


Design and implement transaction monitoring interfaces that visualize the complete lifecycle across Ritual's infrastructure, including broker status, node operations, and cross-chain interactions
Build and maintain dashboard interfaces for things like node deployment, monitoring, and management across cloud providers
Develop web applications that enable users to provision and manage customized node infrastructure through intuitive interfaces
Create responsive dashboards for real-time monitoring of distributed compute resources and container management
Design and implement DeFi-style interfaces for protocol interactions, similar to DEX and vault management experiences
Work closely with product, design, and backend teams to create seamless user experiences
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
Writing efficient, high-quality code that maintains our high standards for user experience


About You


Robust fundamental understanding of HTML/CSS, TypeScript, and React
Strong experience productionizing user interfaces for decentralized applications that interact directly with various EVM-based blockchains
Strong experience with popular Web3 wallet integration libraries (wagmi, ethers, etc.) and blockchain interaction patterns
Proven full-stack experience, with the ability to diagnose and resolve end-to-end issues independently from frontend to backend, including familiarity with API design and server-side architectures
Proficiency with Linux and command-line environments for development and debugging
Experience building responsive monitoring dashboards and data visualization interfaces
Expertise in state management patterns and real-time data handling
Strong understanding of cross-chain transaction flows and blockchain infrastructure
Experience with modern frontend build tools and deployment pipelines
Ability to act quickly under high pressure scenarios and context switch at a high frequency
A high level of end-to-end ownership and self-direction, with excellent communication skills
Hungry, high-energy and ability to work within and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment


Nice to have


Proven track record developing multi-platform applications (web, desktop, mobile)
Experience building interfaces for distributed systems or node management
Background with AI/ML infrastructure monitoring and management
Familiarity with container orchestration and cloud provider interfaces
Experience with Electron or similar desktop application frameworks
Knowledge of GraphQL and real-time data subscriptions
Contributions to open-source projects in the web3 space


Why join us


Join a passionate group of engineers, researchers, and operators on a mission to build the next generation of AI infrastructure
Highly competitive compensation package, including annual discretionary bonus & optimized tax structure compared to the vast majority of web3 startups
Top 1% of benefits across the web3 startup space
100% of premiums covered on highest quality healthcare
Aggressive company 401k match
Fully remote and/or hybrid, up to you!
Participate in virtual and in-person events
Much much more!

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated WordPress Developer. Reporting to the Director of Digital Operations, you will be a key player in shaping MDG's technological future. If you thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, are driven by innovation, and enjoy tackling complex challenges with elegant solutions, we want you on our team.

At MDG, we are revolutionizing the multi-location marketing landscape with our proprietary digital product. You'll contribute to building high-availability, scalable, and performant solutions that empower multi-location organizations to effectively reach and engage their target audiences. Your work will directly impact the success of our clients and shape the future of multi-location marketing.

MDG follows a hybrid work model of Monday/Friday remote and Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday in our Boca Raton office. Our scheduled work hours are 9a-6p.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

• Develops and maintains WordPress websites using custom themes and plugins
• Translates design mockups into responsive HTML/CSS/JS

• Communicates status updates and challenges to project stakeholders
• Ensures all work meets accessibility and cross-browser compatibility standards
• Actively participates in code reviews and team discussions
• Follows internal standards and best practices
• Eager to learn new technologies and improve coding skills
• Provides support for troubleshooting and resolving bugs
• Manages multiple tasks with attention to detail and timelines
• Open to feedback and works collaboratively with cross-functional teams



Requirements

• Proficiency in WordPress theme and plugin development
• Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
• Experience with page builders like Elementor or Gutenberg is a plus
• Basic understanding of PHP and MySQL
• Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)
• Understanding of responsive design principles
• Some experience in SEO best practices and performance optimization
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
• Ability to take initiative and contribute ideas for improvements
• Strong communication and collaboration skills
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent practical experience
• Experience with Laravel and/or NuxtJS is a huge plus




Benefits



We offer competitive healthcare, dental, and vision plans along with several voluntary benefit extras. Employees receive generous PTO in addition to all major holidays and the option to enroll in a comprehensive 401K plan with employer matching.
